snippet: The Citadel said Wednesday that it would provide training on how to prevent sexual abuse, after a former camp counselor there admitted that he molested 23 young boys over a decade.
abstract: Citadel says it will provide training for every student, employee and campus resident on how to prevent sexual, after a former camp counselor's admission that he molested 23 young boys over a decade; military college has formed a partnership with nonprofit group Darkness to Light to conduct training on its Charleston, SC, campus.
lead_paragraph: The Citadel said Wednesday that it would provide training on how to prevent sexual abuse, after a former camp counselor there admitted that he molested 23 young boys over a decade.

headline.seo: Citadel Vows Steps Against Sex Abuse
headline.main: South Carolina: Citadel Vows Steps Against Sex Abuse
headline.print_headline: South Carolina: Citadel Vows Steps Against Sex Abuse

keywords.value: Citadel, The Military College of South Carolina
